name: Berserker's Call
desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

name: Flaming Lasso
desc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Earthshock
desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

name: Frozen Sigil
desc: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.

name: Dragon Blood
desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

name: Spawn Spiderlings
desc: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

name: Chakra Magic
desc: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

name: Corrosive Skin
desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

name: Blink
desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

name: Empower
desc: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.
